page.title: 04WINKFIELD PLACE
page.content: Winkfield Place is a finishing for 80 young ladies aged about 18 to 20 Fees are Â£7000 p.a..Five people clean their cottages.They order 100 carnations,60 roses,75 sprays and 10 dozen of blooms each week from Covent Garden.When flower arrangements are ordered, they do the order they want,and then when they have finished they put them in a cold room ready for the next day and then they do a different arrangement with them.The flowers last a week. The students are taught simple floristry skills as well as the art of arranging flowers for the home, for parties and social occasions. The secretarial displays have been created and prepared by the girls. The girls completing this course have taken Pitman Shorthand Examinations. Other courses include fashion&cooking.
